## Features

```{r label="features"}
# features
slice_genome = function(win_size, genome) {
  feat = epimedtools::monitored_apply(genome, 1, function(l) {
    beg = seq(1, as.numeric(l[[3]]), by=win_size)
    end = beg + win_size
    ret = data.frame(chr=l[[1]], beg=beg, end=end, name1=l[[5]], name2=paste0(l[[4]], "_feat", 1:length(beg)), strand=l[[6]], stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
    return(ret)
  })
  feat = do.call(rbind, feat)
  feat[,4] = paste0("feat_", 1:nrow(feat))
  rownames(feat) = feat[,4]
  feat[,2] = format(feat[,2], scientific = FALSE)
  feat[,3] = format(feat[,3], scientific = FALSE)
  head(feat)
  dim(feat)
  feat
}
```

```{r results="verbatim"}

head(feat)
dim(feat)
```


Genome is sliced into features according to a size of window w, $w \in$ `r range(win_sizes)`.



```{r label="functions"}
options(scipen=999)
win_sizes = c(100000, 50000, 10000, 5000, 1000)
tasks = lapply(win_sizes, function(win_size) {
  list(
    win_size=win_size
  )
})
tasks
compute_matrix_file = function(task) {
  # task = tasks[[1]]
  print(date())
  print(task)
  # parameters
  win_size = task$win_size

  # features
  regions_filename = paste0("tmp/features_", prefix, "_", win_size, ".bed")
  if (!file.exists(regions_filename)) {
    print(paste0("Computing ", regions_filename))
    feat = slice_genome(win_size, genome)
    # prefix = paste0("win_size_", win_size)
    dir.create("tmp", showWarnings=FALSE)
    write.table(feat, file=regions_filename, sep="\t", quote=FALSE,row.names=FALSE, col.names=FALSE)
    print(regions_filename)    
  }
  # features = read.table(regions_filename)
  # head(features)
  # dim(features)

  # compute matrix
  matrix_file = paste0("tmp/matrix_", prefix, "_", win_size, ".txt.gz")
  # Sys.setenv(PATH="/summer/epistorage/miniconda3/envs/mnase_env/bin:$PATH")
  matrix_file = deeptoolsr::dt_compute_matrix_scale(
    regions_filename=regions_filename, score_filename=score_filenames, out_filename=matrix_file, 
    bin_size=format(win_size, scientific = FALSE), 
    region_body_length=format(win_size, scientific = FALSE), 
    before_region_start_length=0, after_region_start_length=0, FORCE_EXEC=TRUE, 
    number_of_processors=192
  )    
  print(matrix_file)
}
stop("EFN")
```

```{r pca}
matrix_file = matrix_files[2]
matrix_file = "tmp/matrix_spectral_5000.txt.gz"
print(matrix_file)
rpkm_wig_signal = mread.tablegz(matrix_file, skip=1, stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
tmp_d = as.matrix(rpkm_wig_signal[,7:ncol(rpkm_wig_signal)])
# tmp_d[300:310,]
# tmp_d[600:610,]
colnames(tmp_d) = rownames(exp_grp)

palette(c(
  "#543005", "#8c510a", "#bf812d", "#dfc27d", "#f6e8c3",
  "#c7eae5", "#80cdc1", "#35978f", "#01665e", "#003c30"
))

  mat = t(as.matrix(tmp_d))
  # idx_samples = rownames(mat)
  mat = mat[idx_samples,]
  dim(mat)
  sds = apply(mat, 2, sd)
  mat = mat[,sds!=0]
  dim(mat)


  pca = prcomp(mat, scale=TRUE)
  v = pca$sdev * pca$sdev
  p = v / sum(v) * 100
  palette("default")
  cols = as.numeric(as.factor(exp_grp[rownames(mat),]$gender))
  # cols = as.numeric(as.factor(exp_grp[rownames(mat),]$qage)) ; palette(c(  "#543005", "#8c510a", "#bf812d", "#dfc27d", "#f6e8c3",  "#c7eae5", "#80cdc1", "#35978f", "#01665e", "#003c30")) ; plot(exp_grp$age, col=as.numeric(as.factor(exp_grp$qage)))
  
  layout(matrix(1:6,2), respect=TRUE)
  # layout(matrix(1:2,1), respect=TRUE)
  barplot(p, ylab="% of variance explained", xlab="components")
  for (i in 1:4) {
    j = i+1
    plot(pca$x[,i], pca$x[,j], 
    	xlab=paste0("PC", i, "(", signif(p[i], 3), "%)"), 
    	ylab=paste0("PC", j, "(", signif(p[j], 3), "%)"), 
    	col=cols,
    	pch=16)  
  }

  print(paste0("  removing..."))
  head(pca$x[,1:2])
  mean = mean(pca$x[,1])
  sd = sd(pca$x[,1])
  pval = pnorm(abs(pca$x[,1]), mean, sd, lower.tail=FALSE)
  padj = p.adjust(pval, method="BH")
  sum(padj <= 0.2)
  range(padj)  
  idx_rm = names(padj)[!padj > 0.2]
  i = 1
  j = i+1
  plot(pca$x[,i], pca$x[,j], 
    xlab=paste0("PC", i, "(", signif(p[i], 3), "%)"), 
    ylab=paste0("PC", j, "(", signif(p[j], 3), "%)"), 
    col=cols,
    pch=16)  
  points(pca$x[idx_rm,i], pca$x[idx_rm,j], 
    col=2,
    cex=3, pch=16)  
  idx_samples = names(padj)[padj > 0.2]




plot(apply(mat, 1, sd), exp_grp[rownames(mat), ]$age)

plot(density(mat))
```

```{r label="slicing"}
print(paste0("Slicing ChIPseq data... (matrix_files)"))
if (!exists("counts")) {
  counts = lapply(matrix_files, function(matrix_file) {
    # matrix_file = matrix_files[2]
    print(matrix_file)
    rpkm_wig_signal = mread.tablegz(matrix_file, skip=1, stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
    tmp_d = as.matrix(rpkm_wig_signal[,7:ncol(rpkm_wig_signal)])
    # tmp_d[300:310,]
    # tmp_d[600:610,]
    colnames(tmp_d) = rownames(exp_grp)
    apply(tmp_d, 2, sum)
    breaks = (0:1000) / 50
    counts = apply(tmp_d, 2, function(c) {
      # c = tmp_d[,1]
      sig = log2(c+1)
      table(cut(sig, breaks=breaks))
    })
    rownames(counts) = paste0("cnt_", breaks[-2])
    colnames(counts) = rownames(exp_grp)
    head(counts)
    dim(counts)
    return(counts)
  })
  names(counts) = matrix_files
}
```
